thread.title: Huge fire breaks out at Tuas View Circuit
thread.title_full: Huge fire breaks out at Tuas View Circuit

title: Huge fire breaks out at Tuas View Circuit
text:
Fire at 23 Tuas View Circuit (Source: Facebook.com/TransporterSG) More A fire has broken out at 23 Tuas View Circuit on Thursday morning, and firefighters are currently on the scene “fighting the fire with water jets”, said the Singapore Civil Defence Force at 7:18AM. Tuas South Ave 3 and Tuas View Crescent are closed to facilitate operations, said the Singapore Police Force. Members of the public have been advised to avoid the area. SBS Transit also said in a tweet at 8:23AM that its bus services 182 and 182M “ will skip bus stops along Tuas South Ave 3, Ave 8 & Ave 9 due to building on fire”. Please be informed that Svcs 182 & 182M will skip bus stops along Tuas South Ave 3, Ave 8 & Ave 9 due to building on fire. 
— SBS Transit (@SBSTransit_Ltd) February 23, 2017 In videos posted on social media, eyewitnesses recorded videos of huge plumes of smoke coming from the affected area. The fire is believed to be coming from a waste management plant. 
— an okgo (@OkgoAn) February 23, 2017 Reblog
